effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move while in hyper mode.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move while in hyper mode.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move while in hyper mode.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has an increased chance for a critical hit in Hyper Mode.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has an increased chance for a critical hit in Hyper Mode.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has an increased chance for a critical hit in Hyper Mode.
